Text:
30+ seeds and no comment still?
Anyways... thanks for this release.
Working, Clean (according to Bit-defender), Simple instructions.

In case anyone wonders about blocking at firewall:  For Windows 7:

open:  Control PanelAll Control Panel ItemsWindows Firewall

Click Advanced Settings

Outbound Rules > New Rule > Next > Browse...

Navigate to and select "Snagit32.exe" > open

Next > Next > Next > Type a name > Finish

Excellent work dude!
Spen007 in Rio
